name: WP-Buzz
author: Stephen Liu

sections.description: WP-Buzz is a plugin to put a post to your [Buzz] account everytime you publish a blog post. All you have to do is setup this plugin, enter your sitename,oauth_consumer_key,oauth_consumer_secret and your domain.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the wp-buzzed.zip
  2. Upload wp-buzzed directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to Settings menu, select the wp-buzz menu
  5. Enter your sitename,oauth_consumer_key,oauth_consumer_secret and your domain.

short_description: Send a post to your Google Buzz account everytime you publish a blog post.
description: WP-Buzz is a plugin to put a post to your [Buzz] account everytime you publish a blog post. All you have to do is setup this plugin, enter your sitename,oauth_consumer_key,oauth_consumer_secret and your domain.
